description:
You picked a 29er because it was fast rolling, right? Flat tires don't roll fast. Throw this tube in your tire and get after it!

  • 48mm Presta valve stem works with deeper rim depths on some MTB rims
  • Burly 1.2mm wall thickness
  • Includes a glueless patch kit
  • Valve core is removable
name: Rubbers 29 x 2.2-2.6" Enduro Tube (48mm Presta Valve)
